81735.「……あんたかい？\n 調理ギルドのスター料理人ってのは。:
...you are the star cook of the Cooking Guild,
aren't you?

81736.「……って おめえ <pc>じゃねえか。\n まさか 調理職人だったたあな。:
You are <pc>, aren't you? No way, it
was Cook.

81737.「オルフェアの町の町長である この俺に \n どうしても あんたの料理を食わせた:
Guildmaster Poshel insisted that I, the mayor
of Orphea, have a taste of your cooking.

81738.「正直 あんまり 気は進まねえけど \n せっかくのゴチソーだ。\n ハラをくく:
To be honest, I'm not too keen on it, but it's all the more reason for me to go to Gochisaw. I'll just have to take it with a grain of
salt.

81740.ナブレット団長は かみしめるように\n<%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>を 味わっ:
Captain Nablette tasted <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM> as he
bit into it!

81741.「あぁ うまいねえ……。 \n 職人のまごころってえやつが こもってる。\n 元:
Ah, it's good. It's filled with the sincerity
of a craftsman. As a former cake maker, I can
vouch for the taste.

81742.「なるほど おめえ いい職人だな。 \n あの ひよっこマスターの お嬢ちゃんが:
I see. You are a good craftsman. I can see why
that chick master's daughter wants to rely on
you.

81743.「……かつての 調理ギルドの罪は\n もう 許されていいのかもしれねえな。:
...Maybe the sins of the former Cooking Guild
can now be forgiven.

81744.「いまから １０年くらい昔のこと。\n 調理ギルドは オルフェアの町に住む\n:
About 10 years ago, the Cooking Guild was the
pride of everyone in Orphea.

81745.「当時の調理マスターは 気のいいやつで \n 子供からお年寄りまで みんなに慕わ:
The master chef at that time was a good-
natured guy, loved by everyone from children
to the elderly. But he has changed.

81746.「あの野郎は 嫁さんを 病気で亡くしてよお。 \n それ以来 禁断とされる料理の:
He lost his wife to illness. Since then, he
began to devote himself to the study of
cooking, which is forbidden.

81747.「禁断の料理は 食べると身体に宿るチカラを\n ギリッギリ極限まで 引き出すこと:
The forbidden food, when eaten, could bring out the power in the body to the very limit. He believed that this was the essence of
cooking.

81748.「そして 自ら クッキングデビルを名乗り\n 各国の料理屋に 禁断の料理を\n:
And then, calling himself Cooking Devil, he
spread forbidden food to restaurants all over
the world...

81749.「禁断の料理を食ったやつは チカラと引き換えに\n 味覚を失ったり ひでえ時ゃ:
Those who ate the forbidden food lost their taste buds in exchange for their power, or in the worst case, they died. The culinary world
is in turmoil.

81750.「そうして 調理ギルドは閉鎖されたよ。\n オルフェアの町のやつらは いまだに\:
And so the Cooking Guild was shut down, and
the guys at Orphea still can't forget the
claws that the guild left in its wake.

81751.「ポシェルが がんばってんのは 知ってるぜ。\n だけどよ みんな 心の底でおび:
I know Poshel is doing his best. But deep
down, we're all scared.

81753.「一度食べたら忘れらんねェ オレ様の料理ィ！！:
Once you've had it, you'll never forget my
cooking!

81754.「うめェもん食って死ねるなんて 上等だろォ？\n しかも 最強の自分に 覚醒でき:
What's better than dying after eating a great meal? And you get to wake up the strongest version of yourself, right? It would be nice
to be thanked for it!

81755.「おいおいおい……クッキングデビルだと！？\n そんなはず あるわけねえ！\n:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey... the Cooking
Devil? Cooking Devil is...

81756.「自分で作った 禁断の料理を食って\n 死んじまったはずだろうがよぉ！！:
You should have died after eating the
forbidden food you made yourself!

81757.「そうさ オレ様は 料理のゴースト……。\n 調理ギルドがあるかぎり 永久に不滅:
Yes, I am the Ghost of Cooking...immortal as
long as there is a Cooking Guild!

81758.「調理ギルドは ふたたび 禁断の料理に\n 手を出すだろうぜェ！\n ……なぜな:
The Cooking Guild will once again try its hand
at forbidden cuisine! ...because that is the
ultimate dish!

81761.「おい おい 大丈夫か ポシェル！\n クッキングデビルに やられたってえのか！: Hey, hey, hey, you okay, Poshel?

81762.「クッキング…デビル……。\n そんな……今のは お父さんなの……？:
King...Devil... Oh no...was that your
father...?

81763.「ウソウソ そんなのウソだよっ！\n お父さんは 死んじゃったんだもん！:
No, no, no, that's not true! My father is
dead!

81765.「クッキングデビルのことは\n 俺のほうでも 調べてみるぜ。\n おめえは 調理:
I'll look into Cooking Devil myself. I'll look
into Cooking Devil on my end.

81766.「<pc>さん ごめんなさい……。\n 気になって来ちゃったの。調理ギルドに戻っ:
<pc> I'm sorry... I was just curious.
I'll tell you about what happened when I come
back to the Cooking Guild...
